tasks.title: Fix CSS button alignment issue
tasks.description: Adjust the alignment of the submit button in the contact form to center it properly

tasks.title: Update footer copyright year
tasks.description: Change copyright year from 2023 to 2024 in website footer

tasks.title: Fix typo in error message
tasks.description: Correct spelling mistake in login error message from 'Pasword' to 'Password'

tasks.title: Add loading spinner to form submission
tasks.description: Display loading spinner when user submits registration form to improve user experience

tasks.title: Implement email validation
tasks.description: Add client-side and server-side email format validation for registration form with appropriate error messages

tasks.title: Create forgot password functionality
tasks.description: Implement forgot password feature with email verification, reset token generation, and password reset form

tasks.title: Add user profile image upload
tasks.description: Allow users to upload and update profile pictures with image validation, resizing, and storage

tasks.title: Implement basic search functionality
tasks.description: Add search bar to user list page with simple text-based filtering and highlighting of results

tasks.title: Create user profile management page
tasks.description: Build comprehensive user profile page where users can update personal information, change password, and manage account settings with form validation

tasks.title: Implement pagination for task list
tasks.description: Add pagination controls to task list with configurable page size, navigation buttons, and page number display

tasks.title: Create REST API for user management
tasks.description: Develop RESTful API endpoints for user CRUD operations including authentication, validation, and error handling

tasks.title: Implement file upload system
tasks.description: Create file upload functionality with drag-and-drop interface, file type validation, progress tracking, and storage management

tasks.title: Add advanced search with filters
tasks.description: Enhance search functionality with multiple filters, date ranges, sorting options, and autocomplete suggestions

tasks.title: Implement real-time notifications
tasks.description: Build notification system with WebSocket connections, push notifications, notification history, and mark as read functionality

tasks.title: Create admin dashboard with analytics
tasks.description: Develop comprehensive admin dashboard with user statistics, charts, data visualization, and report generation capabilities

tasks.title: Implement payment processing system
tasks.description: Integrate payment gateway with subscription management, invoice generation, payment history, and webhook handling for payment events

tasks.title: Build chat system with file sharing
tasks.description: Create real-time chat application with message history, file attachments, emoji support, typing indicators, and online status

tasks.title: Implement advanced project management features
tasks.description: Build comprehensive project management system with Gantt charts, resource allocation, time tracking, milestone management, and team collaboration tools

tasks.title: Create AI-powered recommendation engine
tasks.description: Develop machine learning-based recommendation system with user behavior analysis, content filtering, personalization algorithms, and A/B testing framework

tasks.title: Database schema optimization
tasks.description: Optimize database performance with index creation, query optimization, data archiving, and migration scripts

tasks.title: Implement two-factor authentication
tasks.description: Add 2FA security feature with SMS and authenticator app support, backup codes, and account recovery options

tasks.title: Create mobile-responsive design
tasks.description: Convert existing desktop interface to mobile-responsive design with touch-friendly controls and optimized layouts

tasks.title: Fix memory leak in image processing
tasks.description: Identify and resolve memory leak issue in image upload and processing functionality

tasks.title: Add dark mode theme
tasks.description: Implement dark mode theme option with theme toggle, color scheme management, and user preference storage

tasks.title: Create automated testing suite
tasks.description: Develop comprehensive automated testing framework with unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end test coverage

tasks.description: Allow users to export their data in multiple formats (CSV, PDF, Excel) with customizable fields and date ranges

tasks.description: Integrate OAuth authentication with Google, Facebook, and GitHub login options with account linking capabilities

tasks.title: Create backup and restore system
tasks.description: Implement automated backup system with scheduled backups, data encryption, and disaster recovery procedures

tasks.title: Optimize page load performance
tasks.description: Improve application performance through code splitting, lazy loading, caching strategies, and bundle optimization

tasks.title: Add multi-language support
